item.title: Welcome Introduction
item.author: josh@nullidle.com (Joshua Marcum)
item.description: Introduction We’re open to the public so I guess I might as well introduce myself. Joshua Marcum here, and until very recently I was a Security Engineer for a global network communications provider’s cybersecurity incident response team. I’ve always held an interest in trying to understand server technology, this obsession started at age ten when I created my first website. This decision started a chain reaction. I decided free hosting was not good enough, I needed a domain, and then now some place to host my site.
